news.title: James Webb Space Telescope captures stunning images of the Carina Nebula
China launches new space station module
New study finds that climate change is making hurricanes more intense
Scientists develop new vaccine that protects against all known strains of malaria
James Webb Space Telescope captures first direct image of an exoplanet
Scientists develop new type of battery that can charge in minutes and last for days
New study finds that regular exercise can help to prevent Alzheimer's disease
Scientists develop new type of solar cell that is more efficient and cheaper than previous designs
New study finds that the universe is expanding faster than previously thought
Scientists develop new type of cancer treatment that targets the tumor's immune system
